trans-unit.target: Biedt gegevens voor de rij-gerelateerde <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> gebeurtenissen.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewRowEventArgs class provides data for the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.NewRowNeeded> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderCellChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowMinimumHeightChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowUnshared> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserAddedRow> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletedRow> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDividerHeightChanged>
trans-unit.target: De klasse DataGridViewRowEventArgs biedt gegevens voor de volgende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>gebeurtenissen:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.NewRowNeeded>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderCellChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowMinimumHeightChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowUnshared>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserAddedRow>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletedRow>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDividerHeightChanged></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDividerHeightChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletedRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserAddedRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowUnshared> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowMinimumHeightChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderCellChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.NewRowNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `dataGridViewRow` parameter value to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Deze constructor gebruikt de `dataGridViewRow` parameterwaarde initialiseren de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>eigenschap.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that the event occurred for.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> die voor de gebeurtenis heeft plaatsgevonden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> associated with the event.
